2 * 3 + (4 * 5) becomes 26.
5 + (8 * 3 + 9 + 3 * 4 * 3) becomes 437.
5 * 9 * (7 * 3 * 3 + 9 * 3 + (8 + 6 * 4)) becomes 12240.
((2 + 4 * 9) * (6 + 9 * 8 + 6) + 6) + 2 + 4 * 2 becomes 13632.


```{r}
x <- "((2 + 4 * 9) * (6 + 9 * 8 + 6) + 6) + 2 + 4 * 2"

domath <- function(x){
  l <- str_extract(x, "\\d+")
  op <- str_extract(x, "\\*|\\+")
  r <- str_remove(x, "^ (\\d|\\+|\\*)")
  list(l, op, r)
}

"((2 + 4 * 9) * (6 + 9 * 8 + 6) + 6) + 2 + 4 * 2" %>% domath()
```
